original_text:
Greta Goes Wild
Dedicata all’Oktoberfest, Greta Goes Wild è la nuova slot creata dalla iSoftBet che, ne siamo certi, farà contenti tutti i numerosi fan di questa festa a cui ogni anno partecipano migliaia di persone provenienti da tutto il mondo.
Sarà per l’argomento trattato, sarà perché la grafica utilizzata è di primissimo livello, ma dopo aver provato questa slot ci è venuta una gran voglia di fiondarci nel primo pub per sorseggiare una birra doppio malto! Lo sfondo su cui si muovono i rulli sono la locanda di Greta, con i barili di birra in bella mostra e qualche bicchiere schiumoso poggiato sul bancone. Sulla destra troviamo pochi tasti, giusto quello per lo Start e per i giri automatici, oltre a quello per accedere alle impostazioni. Una musica goliardica tipica dei luoghi accompagna ogni rotazione dei rulli, aumentando di molto l’aria di festa che si respira durante il gioco.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Per Greta Goes Wild si è deciso di puntare su una griglia di gioco dal taglio classico con 5 rulli e 3 righe. Le linee di pagamento sono 10 e fisse, con una puntata minima molto contenuta pari a 0,01 € su ciascuna linea, quindi ogni spin costerà appena 0,10 €. La puntata totale massima è invece di 30 €. I giri automatici possono variare tra 10 e 100. Volatilità alta e RTP di 96% fanno di Greta Goes Wild un’ottima slot con alte possibilità di vincita, sino a 8.000 € la puntata!
Simboli e funzionalità di Greta Goes Wild
Le carte dal 9 all’asso sono i simboli che pagano meno. Ponendo di effettuare una scommessa di minima, pari quindi a 0,10 €, vedendo comparire cinque 9 o 10 si vincono 0,20 €, con lo stesso numero di J e Q arriviamo a 0,30 €, il K e l’asso 0,40 €. Con i simboli tematici la musica comincia a cambiare: pretzel, cappello, barile e avventore della locanda offrono buone vincite, così come il logo del gioco.
Un’ottima vincita è invece offerta da Greta in persona, che ha anche la funzione di Wild andando a sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, rappresentato dal tipico boccale bavarese. In base al numero di simboli atterrati sui rulli potremo ricevere tra i 10 e i 15 giri gratuiti, durante i quali i simboli Wild rimarranno bloccati sui rulli. Ma non si tratta di Wild normali, infatti ad essi è associato un moltiplicatore 2x o 3x. Nel caso 2 o 3 Wild compaiono uno accanto all’altro, allora la vincita verrà moltiplicata per 2 o per 3. Durante i giri regolari Greta può fare capolino sui rulli e regalarci una mega vincita che può superare 25X oppure offrirci un bonus. Se compare durante i Free Spins invece verremo ricompensato con un nuovo giro gratuito.

raw_translation.response:
Greta Goes Wild - A must-play Oktoberfest-themed slot by iSoftBet that is sure to delight even the most seasoned gamblers. The graphics used are of the utmost quality and will make you feel like you are right at the heart of the festival. The reels are set against the backdrop of the Greta Inn, with an array of beer barrels and foamy glasses on display. The simplistic layout offers just a few buttons to play with, including the Start and Auto-Spin buttons, as well as the Settings button. The accompanying jovial music adds an exciting and festive atmosphere to the proceedings.

Key Features of the Slot Machine:
Greta Goes Wild features a classic layout with 5 reels and 3 rows, offering 10 fixed pay lines and a minimum bet of just €0.01 on each line, making every spin as cheap as €0.10. The maximum total bet is €30, with Auto-Spins ranging between 10 and 100. This slot offers high volatility and an impressive 96% RTP, with the possibility of winning up to €8,000 on a single bet!

Symbols and Functionalities:
The slot's low-paying symbols include cards from 9 to Ace, with a bet of just €0.10 allowing for a payout of €0.20 for five matching 9s or 10s, €0.30 for Js and Qs, and €0.40 for Ks and Aces. The thematic symbols offer better winnings, with pretzels, hats, beer barrels and inn-goers providing ample opportunity to hit it big. The game's logo also offers excellent payouts. However, the real star of the show is Greta herself as she takes on the role of Wild, replacing all symbols except the Scatter, which is represented by a traditional Bavarian beer stein. The number of Scatter symbols landed on the reels determine the number of Free Spins awarded, ranging from 10 to 15. During the Free Spins, the Wild symbols remain locked in position, and are associated with 2x or 3x multipliers. If two or three Wild symbols appear together, the payout will be multiplied accordingly. During regular spins, Greta herself may appear and grant a mega win of up to 25x, or trigger a bonus game. If she shows up during Free Spins, players can look forward to receiving an extra free spin.

In conclusion, Greta Goes Wild is an exceptional slot game that will please any gambler seeking an Oktoberfest-themed experience with excellent opportunities to win big. So grab a cold beer and spin those reels today!

raw_translation.response:
Greta Goes Wild

Dedicated to Oktoberfest, Greta Goes Wild is the new slot created by iSoftBet that is sure to please the numerous fans of this festival that attracts thousands of people from all over the world every year.

Perhaps it's the subject matter, or maybe it's the top-notch graphics used, but after trying this slot, we felt a strong urge to head to the nearest pub and sip on a double malt beer! The background on which the reels move is Greta's inn, with barrels of beer on full display and a few frothy glasses resting on the counter. On the right, we find only a few buttons, just the one for Start and for automatic spins, as well as one to access the settings. A typical jovial music of the place accompanies each rotation of the reels, increasing the festive atmosphere that is felt during the game.

Main features of the slot machine

For Greta Goes Wild, they decided to focus on a classic game grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. There are 10 fixed pay lines, and the minimum bet is very reasonable at 0.01€ on each line, so every spin will cost only 0.10€. The maximum total bet is 30€. The automatic spins can vary between 10 and 100. High volatility and an RTP of 96% make Greta Goes Wild an excellent slot with high chances of winning, up to 8,000€ per bet!

Symbols and features of Greta Goes Wild

Cards from 9 to Ace are the symbols that pay the least. Assuming a minimum bet, therefore, equal to 0.10€, seeing five 9s or 10s appear will win 0.20€, with the same number of Js and Qs we get to 0.30€, the K, and Ace 0.40€. With the thematic symbols, the music starts to change: pretzels, hats, barrels, and inn customers offer good winnings, as does the game logo.

A great win is instead offered by Greta in person, who also has the function of Wild, replacing all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the typical Bavarian beer mug. Based on the number of symbols landed on the reels, we can receive between 10 and 15 free spins, during which the Wild symbols will remain locked on the reels. But these are not ordinary Wilds, in fact, they are associated with a 2x or 3x multiplier. If 2 or 3 Wilds appear next to each other, then the winnings will be multiplied by 2 or 3. During regular spins, Greta can peek at the reels and give us a mega win that can exceed 25X or offer us a bonus. If she appears during Free Spins, we will be rewarded with a new free spin.

Greta Goes Wild

Dedicated to Oktoberfest, Greta Goes Wild is the new slot created by iSoftBet that is sure to please the numerous fans of this festival that attracts thousands of people from all over the world every year.

Perhaps it's the subject matter, or maybe it's the top-notch graphics used, but after trying this slot, we felt a strong urge to head to the nearest pub and sip on a double malt beer! The background on which the reels move is Greta's inn, with barrels of beer on full display and a few frothy glasses resting on the counter. On the right, we find only a few buttons, just the one for Start and for automatic spins, as well as one to access the settings. A typical jovial music of the place accompanies each rotation of the reels, increasing the festive atmosphere that is felt during the game.

Main features of the slot machine

For Greta Goes Wild, they decided to focus on a classic game grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. There are 10 fixed pay lines, and the minimum bet is very reasonable at 0.01€ on each line, so every spin will cost only 0.10€. The maximum total bet is 30€. The automatic spins can vary between 10 and 100. High volatility and an RTP of 96% make Greta Goes Wild an excellent slot with high chances of winning, up to 8,000€ per bet!

Symbols and features of Greta Goes Wild

Assuming a minimum bet, therefore, equal to 0.10€, seeing five 9s or 10s appear will win 0.20€, with the same number of Js and Qs we get to 0.30€, the K, and Ace 0.40€. With the thematic symbols, the music starts to change: pretzels, hats, barrels, and inn customers offer good winnings, as does the game logo.

The Scatter symbol triggers 10 to 15 free spins if players land it on the reels. During free spins, Wilds that appear on the grid remain locked, and players can benefit from a 2x or 3x multiplier. If two or three Wilds appear next to each other, winnings will be multiplied accordingly.

Bonus features

The game offers a variety of bonus features, including free spins, Wild symbols, and multipliers. Greta's peeking feature can give players a mega win or a bonus during regular spins. The game's high volatility and 96% RTP ensure that players have ample chances to win big on each spin. Offering a maximum payout of up to 8,000€, Greta Goes Wild is a thrilling and enjoyable slot game.

Review: Greta Goes Wild

Dedicated to Oktoberfest, Greta Goes Wild is the new slot created by iSoftBet that is sure to please the numerous fans of this festival that attracts thousands of people from all over the world every year.

Perhaps it's the subject matter, or maybe it's the top-notch graphics used, but after trying this slot, we felt a strong urge to head to the nearest pub and sip on a double malt beer! The background on which the reels move is Greta's inn, with barrels of beer on full display and a few frothy glasses resting on the counter. On the right, we find only a few buttons, just the one for Start and for automatic spins, as well as one to access the settings. A typical jovial music of the place accompanies each rotation of the reels, increasing the festive atmosphere that is felt during the game.

Main features of the slot machine

For Greta Goes Wild, they decided to focus on a classic game grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. There are 10 fixed pay lines, and the minimum bet is very reasonable at 0.01€ on each line, so every spin will cost only 0.10€. The maximum total bet is 30€. The automatic spins can vary between 10 and 100. High volatility and an RTP of 96% make Greta Goes Wild an excellent slot with high chances of winning, up to 8,000€ per bet!

Symbols and features of Greta Goes Wild

Cards from 9 to Ace are the symbols that pay the least. Assuming a minimum bet, therefore, equal to 0.10€, seeing five 9s or 10s appear will win 0.20€, with the same number of Js and Qs we get to 0.30€, the K, and Ace 0.40€. With the thematic symbols, the music starts to change: pretzels, hats, barrels, and inn customers offer good winnings, as does the game logo.

A great win is instead offered by Greta in person, who also has the function of Wild, replacing all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the typical Bavarian beer mug. Based on the number of symbols landed on the reels, we can receive between 10 and 15 free spins, during which the Wild symbols will remain locked on the reels. But these are not ordinary Wilds, in fact, they are associated with a 2x or 3x multiplier. If 2 or 3 Wilds appear next to each other, then the winnings will be multiplied by 2 or 3. During regular spins, Greta can peek at the reels and give us a mega win that can exceed 25X or offer us a bonus. If she appears during Free Spins, we will be rewarded with a new free spin.
